errors.error_description: The hyperlink to the 'Intro to GPflow 2.0' notebook is broken, pointing to `intro_to_gpflow.html` instead of the correct `intro_to_gpflow2.html`, resulting in a 404 error.
correction_candidates: Change the link to point to the `gpflow2_upgrade_guide.html` instead.
Change the link to point to the root of the `notebooks` directory.
